uas.lntv.pacmangame.AI

Class Pathfinder

  • java.lang.Object
    • uas.lntv.pacmangame.AI.Pathfinder

  • public class Pathfinder
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is generated to find the shortest Path from a starting point to a certain destination. In the PacMan game it is used by the ghosts to either find the shortest path to their prey PacMan, or to find the fastest way home or away from PacMan if he is in hunting mode, using the A*-Algorithm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • Pathfinder

        public Pathfinder(MapScreen screen,
                  Enemy hunter,
                  Actor prey)
        This constructor is used to find the shortest path to an actor, which will be PacMan in this game. It generates a matrix of the whole map and also calculates the heuristics to the target. It also prepares to search by creating a 'open' list with all tiles of the map, setting the cost of the starting tile to 0 and creating a yet empty 'closed' list.
        Parameters:
        screen - the screen on which you are searching the path
        hunter - actor that wants to find a shortest path
        prey - target of the actor

      • Pathfinder

        public Pathfinder(MapScreen screen,
                  Enemy hunter,
                  int targetX,
                  int targetY)
        Does the same as the first constructor, but uses x-/y-coordinates instead of an actor.
        Parameters:
        screen - the screen on which you are searching the path
        hunter - actor that wants to find a shortest path
        targetX - x-position of the aimed tile
        targetY - y-position of the aimed tile
        See Also:
        Pathfinder

    • Method Detail

      • aStarAlg

        private boolean aStarAlg()
        In this method the magic happens. It creates connections between tiles and tells every edited tile, which is the best tile on the way back to the starting point. Once it reaches the target, the shortest path is found.
        Returns:
        'false' if it only did a calculating step or 'true' if it found either the shortest path or no path

      • calcHeuristics

        private double calcHeuristics(int xTile,
                              int yTile,
                              int xGoal,
                              int yGoal)
        Calculate the heuristics from a tile to a goal via Pythagoras' formula
        Parameters:
        xTile - x-coordinate of the starting tile
        yTile - y-coordinate of the starting tile
        xGoal - x-coordinate of the aimed tile
        yGoal - y-coordinate of the aimed tile
        Returns:
        length of the direct connection between the tiles

      • searchHunter

        private int searchHunter()
        Runs through the 'open'-list until it finds the tile on which the hunter is at right now.
        Returns:
        Index of the 'open'-list where the hunter's at

      • extractMinimum

        private Tile extractMinimum()
        Runs through the whole 'open'-list and searches for the tile in the map with the lowest total-value, which is the sum of the costs and the heuristics. This tile is needed for the next step of the A*-algorithm and will be removed from the 'open'-list.
        Returns:
        Tile with lowest total-value

      • prepareHunterTile

        private void prepareHunterTile()
        Preparing the starting tile for the A*-Algorithm Cost = 0 Total = Heuristics

      • setupOpenList

        private void setupOpenList()
        Putting all tiles of the map into the 'open'-list

      • aStarResult

        public Tile aStarResult()
        Calculates the shortest path to the target.
        Returns:
        next tile from the actor on the way to its target.
